translation:
Sir Villa de Melo, August 12, 1841

Sir

Considering that you must have precisely arrived on foot at that point and that it will not be possible to procure a horse so soon for Your Excellency Your Excellency

Without more, send your friend who kisses your hands. Manuel de Aleman

Replied on August 19, 1841.
